name: Police Escape Outlaw Racer Free
description:
Ready..1..2..3..GO!

Over 1.8 million downloads worldwide!

Has been to #1 FREE Racing around the world!

Don’t stop for anything as you speed down the highway dodging traffic or you will get smashed and EXPLODE!!

Be sure to crank up the volume and cruise to the awesome sound track!

How far can you get?

Great Reviews:
*****
Great escape game! - Awesome racing game, love the music and the speed
*****
Casual kickass! - Rocking graphics . Fun music, simple gameplay ... One of those games you can keep coming back to so you can beat your highscore.

Featuring
******
- Weapons, Armour, Nitro Boosts and more!
- Fast paced gameplay to get your blood pumping!
- Classic gameplay - tilt to dodge!
- Multiplayer - Race your friends!
